lead_paragraph: Sidney Crosby and Carl Hagelin each scored twice and the Pittsburgh Penguins beat the Ottawa Senators 5-3 Tuesday night for their seventh straight victory.

headline.print_headline: Crosby, Hagelin Score Twice, Pens Beat Sens 5-3
headline.main: Crosby, Hagelin Score Twice, Pens Beat Sens 5-3
